summary: [2:52am] you push open the door to the bar with a quiet creak, doing your best not to wake the other league members. closing the...
body: [2:52am] you push open the door to the bar with a quiet creak, doing your best not to wake the other league members. closing the door behind you, you can’t help the sigh of relief as you slump onto the couch, too exhausted to make it to your bedroom on the next floor up. you’ve barely drifted off to sleep when you feel a pair of strong arms lifting you, and you start to fight back until you notice the familiar scars and stitches. “what are you doing, ashtray?” you ask, but you’re too asleep to put any real venom into the words. you feel his laugh more than you hear it as you’re tucked into your bed. you start to question him again, but a simple kiss to your forehead has you burying yourself in the covers, content for the night as dabi closes the door behind him.

summary: sell your soul (not your whole self)
title: sell your soul (not your whole self)
description:
by detectivepanta

Ochako couldn’t work for herself, and she and her mother were poor. She needed, more than anything, for her mother to live. So, she bowed at Stain’s feet as his student.

It was the only option left, after all.

tags: idk that just popped in my head and i had to write it down
summary:
Fanfic concept that is juicy af but I'll probably never use (edition 127377437)
Everybody is sure there's nothing wrong with...
body:
Fanfic concept that is juicy af but I’ll probably never use (edition 127377437)

Everybody is sure there’s nothing wrong with Midoriya Izuku. He looks normal, acts normal, sounds normal. He’s there, shining as always, with his jumpy adorable behaviour, fluffly hair and signature freckled face.

But Uraraka knows there’s something wrong. The Izuku she sees is not who she once knew. She killed Izuku with her bare hands, and now that stranger just replaced him. Just like the last time. And the other. And the other. Every time she kills Izuku, a copy of him just appears like nothing had changed. No blood, no scars, no fear and no sharp blades. Just those cursed freckles.

summary: Opinion on AU where Endeavor isn’t the horrible garbage pile he is in canon?
question: Opinion on AU where Endeavor isn’t the horrible garbage pile he is in canon?
answer:
That would be great although the characters we know wouldn’t be the same.

Endeavor wouldn’t have an obsession with surpassing All Might and therefore wouldn’t be among the best heroes, but he’d definitely be happier. He’d fall in love with Rei and give her Autumn bell flowers every time he took her out for the dinner. They’d be in a happy relationship.

Todoroki’s character would resemble Midoriya’s as the two of them would often watch videos together and cheer on All Might *ofc Endeavor would be jealous*. They’d be best friends and attend U.A. Todoroki would be the only one who knew about All Might giving Midoriya his hair. Inko and Rei would be great friends and they’d often invite each other for the coffe.

Fuyumi wouldn’t be a nervous wreck and she’d have more of a laid back personality. She’d definitely have many friends and girls would always ask her about her brothers which would irritate her to the core. She loves watching TV dramas so I suppose she’d like to become an actress rather than a teacher.

Natsuo would hang around with Touya and they’d be such a mischievous duo. Endeavor would always save them from trouble and later give them a lecture after taking them into a headlock and ruffle their heads *he loves his two dorks*. Natsuo loves the sea so he’d probably be into water sports and Touya would work as a tattoo artist.

Rei would prepare soba and everyone would sit for the table, eat and talk about funny things *and Endeavor would annoy his kids with dad jokes*. Rei is always smiling as she couldn’t feel more grateful for having such a wonderful family.

But there’s always a dark side to a happy story. Hawks would never met Endeavor and his family would remain poor. He’d lose faith in hero society and become a villain.

blog.name: greenvalleybroccoli
blog.title: Deku Said Trans Rights!!!
blog.description: Hi, I'm Bennett. I'm 24 but I have trouble with social stuff so I might come across as immature. I'm studying Japanese and I love BNHA a little too much. I also love my sister @r2-dj! Feel free to ask me anything as long as it's SFW!

tags: this took a long time to make
if you'd like to know about someone else's name please send an ask!
because i don't often have enough energy to make something like this
honestly you can ask me anything about japanese and i'll do my best to answer
i'm not an expert but i love to look things up if i don't know them
title: 1-A Name Meanings
body:
Almost everyone in BNHA has kanji in their name relating to their quirk, so I thought I’d show off some of those! The highlighted characters/words are defined on the right!

And as promised here is Uraraka’s hero name explanation (I wish I could say I’d figured this out myself, but I read about it elsewhere)

reblog.comment:

blog.name: chronicsbd
blog.title: Chronic Sleepy B*tch Disease
blog.description:
Shinsou Hitoshi || 17 || Ask your question and leave
[ RP/askblog for a good purple boy ]
[ M/A: Open ]
[ IC unless stated otherwise ]
[ Mobile is main platform; bear with me ]
[ Main: invisiblepianist ]

summary: "A certain underground hero who shall not be named said it would be...beneficial for me to get used to other's attention. For...
body:
“A certain underground hero who shall not be named said it would be…beneficial for me to get used to other’s attention. For interviews, or something. So if you’ve got questions, lay ‘em on me, I guess.”

(I CAVED AND MADE AN ASKBLOG…TAKE THIS BOY.)

((also my main is @invisiblepianist so theres that info!!))

summary: Happy Erasermic Week 2019!! Day 1: Reminiscence, Recollection, Memories! I decided on my ideas a bit late (as...
caption:
Happy Erasermic Week 2019!!

Day 1: Reminiscence, Recollection, Memories!

I decided on my ideas a bit late (as @fucking-zawa-sensei and @kittymiczawa can both attest) so most of my works this week will be on the sketchier side, but I’m still stoked for the week nevertheless ✨ And thank you to @erasermicweek for organizing this whole thing! 💖✨
